verses.text: Mamin rey, yab'ocab' Jehová co Diosal a onh yinhtil onh vinhaj Jacob a lesalvi. Aocab' tzach colani ayic ayach och d'a ilk'olal.
Yak'ocab'cot scolval d'ayach masanto d'a stemplo d'a Sion.
Snaocab'cot masanil ofrenda ix ak'a'. Schaocab' sk'ool a silab' tza nhustz'aoc.
Aocab' ol ak'an elk'och icha a gana yed' masanil tastac nab'il uuj.
Ol el cav yuj tzalajk'olal ayic ol ak'an ganar eb' ajk'ool. Ol quik'chaanh co bandera yuj quik'anchaanh co Diosal. Aocab' Jehová tz'ak'an masanil tas k'anb'il uuj.
Cojtacxo ticnaic to a Jehová ol colan vinh co reyal sik'b'ilel yuuj. Masanto d'a satchaanh to anhej ay yico', ol tak'voccot d'ay. Yuj spoder Jehová chi' ol yak' ganar nivac oval vinh co reyal.
Ay eb' tz'ak'anoch scarruaje yic oval yipoc sk'ool, ay pax juntzanhxo eb', a nok' schej eb' syak'och yipoc sk'ool. A onhxo pax tic, a Jehová co Diosal scak'och yipoc co k'ool.
A eb' chi' spax yip yoc eb', stelvi eb', a onhxo pax tic jun, tek'tek' caji, linhannhej onh q'uei.
Mamin Jehová, col vinh co reyal. Tak'vanh d'ayonh ayic tzach cavtani.
